meanings.definition: The state or quality of being elated.
meanings.sent1: Her face showed pure elatedness when she received the award.
meanings.sent2: The elatedness in the room was contagious, spreading from person to person.
meanings.sent3: The elatedness of the puppy after a successful trick was truly heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: The elatedness of the crowd reached a crescendo as the band took the stage.
meanings.sent5: The elatedness of winning the championship was a moment she would never forget.

meanings.definition: A feeling of great happiness or joy.
meanings.sent1: The elatedness on his face was impossible to miss.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't contain her elatedness when she saw her surprise birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The elatedness of finding money in an old jacket pocket was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent4: The elatedness in her voice was evident as she shared the good news.
meanings.sent5: His eyes sparkled with elatedness as he opened the long-awaited gift.
